institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 39 (subsidy payment and accounting settlement)
contents: Article 39 (Support Payment and Accounting Settlement) ① The Chairman may provide support to the center for labor costs, operating expenses, etc., and the support fund must be paid in two or more installments. ② The Chairman may consult an external accounting agency for transparent and efficient execution of the support fund. An accounting audit must be conducted within the first quarter of the following year after the end of each year's business period.
